official-title.#text:
To amend section 701 of the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014 to clarify the
			 period of eligibility during which certain spouses are entitled to
			 assistance under the Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry Scholarship.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text: Clarification of Eligibility for Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry Scholarship

text.#text:
